Verses: 1 yesu Ivaigalai Sonna Pinbu Thammudaiya Kangalai Vaanaththukku Ereduththu:

2 pidhaave, Velai Vandhadhu, Neer Ummudaiya Kumaaranukkuth Thandharulina Yaavarukkum Avar Niththiyajeevanaik Kodukkumporuttu Maamsamaana Yaavarmelum Neer Avarukku Adhigaarankoduththapadiye, Ummudaiya Kumaaran Ummai Magimaippaduththumpadikku Neer Ummudaiya Kumaaranai Magimaippaduththum.
3 ondraana Meydhevanaagiya Ummaiyum Neer Anuppinavaraagiya Yesukristhuvaiyum Arivadhe Niththiyajeevan.
4 boomiyile Naan Ummai Magimaippaduththinen; Naan Seyyumpadi Neer Enakku Niyamiththa Kiriyaiyai Seydhumudiththen.
5 pidhaave, Ulagam Undaagiradharku Munne Ummidaththil Enakku Undaayirundha Magimaiyinaale Ippozhudhu Neer Ennai Ummidaththile Magimaippaduththum.

6 neer Ulagaththil Therindheduththu Enakkuth Thandha Manusharukku Ummudaiya Naamaththai Velippaduththinen. Avargal Ummudaiyavargalaayirundhaargal, Avargalai Enakkuth Thandheer, Avargal Ummudaiya Vasanaththaik Kaikkondirukkiraargal.
7 neer Enakkuth Thandhavaigalellaam Ummaale Undaayinavendru Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkiraargal.

8 neer Enakkuk Koduththa Vaarththaigalai Naan Avargalukkuk Koduththen; Avargal Avaigalai Etrukkondu, Naan Ummidaththilirundhu Purappattuvandhen Endru Nichchayamaai Arindhu, Neer Ennai Anuppineer Endru Visuvaasiththirukkiraargal.
9 naan Avargalukkaaga Vendikkollugiren; Ulagaththukkaaga Vendikkollaamal, Neer Enakkuth Thandhavargalukkaaga Vendikkollugiren; Avargal Ummudaiyavargalaayirukkiraargale.
10 ennudaiyavaigal Yaavum Ummudaiyavaigal, Ummudaiyavaigal Ennudaiyavaigal; Avargalil Naan Magimaippattirukkiren,

11 naan Ini Ulagaththiliren, Ivargal Ulagaththilirukkiraargal; Naan Ummidaththirku Varugiren. Parisuththa Pidhaave, Neer Enakkuth Thandhavargal Nammaippola Ondraayirukkumpadikku, Neer Avargalai Ummudaiya Naamaththinaale Kaaththukkollum.

12 naan Avargaludanekooda Ulagaththilirukkaiyil Avargalai Ummudaiya Naamaththinaale Kaaththukkonden; Neer Enakkuth Thandhavargalaik Kaaththukkonduvandhen; Vedhavaakkiyam Niraiveraththakkadhaaga, Kettin Magan Kettupponaaneyallaamal, Avargalil Oruvanum Kettuppogavillai.
13 ippozhudhu Naan Ummidaththirku Varugiren; Avargal En Sandhoshaththai Niraivaai Adaiyumpadi Ulagaththil Irukkaiyil Ivaigalai Sollugiren.
14 naan Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyai Avargalukkuk Koduththen; Naan Ulagaththaanallaadhadhupola Avargalum Ulagaththaaralla; Aadhalaal Ulagam Avargalaip Pagaiththadhu.
15 neer Avargalai Ulagaththilirundhu Eduththukkollumpadi Naan Vendikkollaamal, Neer Avargalaith Theemaiyinindru Kaakkumpadi Vendikkollugiren.
16 naan Ulagaththaanallaadhadhupola, Avargalum Ulagaththaaralla.
17 ummudaiya Saththiyaththinaale Avargalaip Parisuththamaakkum; Ummudaiya Vasaname Saththiyam.
18 neer Ennai Ulagaththil Anuppinadhupola, Naanum Avargalai Ulagaththil Anuppugiren.
19 avargalum Saththiyaththinaale Parisuththamaakkappattavargalaagumpadi, Avargalukkaaga Naan Ennaiththaane Parisuththamaakkugiren.
20 naan Ivargalukkaaga Vendikkollugiradhumallaamal, Ivargaludaiya Vaarththaiyinaal Ennai Visuvaasikkiravargalukkaagavum Vendikkollugiren.

21 avargalellaarum Ondraayirukkavum, Pidhaave, Neer Ennai Anuppinadhai Ulagam Visuvaasikkiradharkaaga, Neer Ennileyum Naan Ummileyum Irukkiradhupola Avargalellaarum Nammil Ondraayirukkavum Vendikkollugiren.
22 naam Ondraayirukkiradhupola Avargalum Ondraayirukkumpadi Neer Enakkuththandha Magimaiyai Naan Avargalukkuk Koduththen.

23 orumaippaattil Avargal Therinavargalaayirukkumpadikkum, Ennai Neer Anuppinadhaiyum, Neer Ennil Anbaayirukkiradhupola Avargalilum Anbaayirukkiradhaiyum Ulagam Ariyumpadikkum, Naan Avargalilum Neer Ennilum Irukkumpadi Vendikkollugiren.

24 pidhaave, Ulagaththotraththukku Mun Neer Ennil Anbaayirundhapadiyinaal, Neer Enakkuth Thandha Ennudaiya Magimaiyai Neer Enakkuth Thandhavargal Kaanumpadiyaaga, Naan Enge Irukkireno Ange Avargalum Ennudanekooda Irukka Virumbugiren.
25 needhiyulla Pidhaave, Ulagam Ummai Ariyavillai, Naan Ummai Arindhirukkiren; Neer Ennai Anuppinadhai Ivargalum Arindhirukkiraargal.
26 neer Ennidaththil Vaiththa Anbu Avargalidaththilirukkumpadikkum, Naanum Avargalilirukkumpadikkum, Ummudaiya Naamaththai Avargalukkuth Theriyappaduththinen; Innamum Theriyappaduththuven Endraar.
